pages.text: $(item)Eggplant$() is a common Vegetable Food item that can be grown by planting $(item)Eggplant Seeds$().$(br)Harvesting fully-grown corn yields from 1 to 5 eggplants per crop harvested and no seeds per crop harvested.$(br)$(item)Eggplant$() can be used in several $(pot)Crock Pot$() recipes like $(item)Stuffed Eggplant$() and has a vegetable value of 1 in the recipes.
$(item)Eggplant Seeds$() can be obtained from breaking all variants of grass, which yields 0 to 1 seed.$(br2)It also can be crafted by the $(item)Eggplant$() in the Crafting Table.

$(item)Braised Eggplant$() is a Vegetable Food item made by cooking $(item)Eggplant$().$(br)It restores more $(thing)Hunger Meter$() compared to its raw counterpart.$(br2)It can also be used as an ingredient in several $(pot)Crock Pot$() recipes.
